JSCoverage
code coverage for JavaScript

Who's using JSCoverage?

  • The pokersource online poker project has used JSCoverage in testing the JavaScript client
  • MicroMVC, a JavaScript Model-View-Controller framework
  • The KSS Ajax framework
  • Micro Facts
  • The jQuery Validation plugin
  • The jqMock JavaScript mock object framework
  • The Mozilla project has used JSCoverage for instrumenting JavaScript code in Firefox

If you, your project, or your company uses JSCoverage in testing your JavaScript code, please send email to jscoverage@siliconforks.com so you can be added to this list. (It is not necessary that it be a Free Software/Open Source project.)
